case.name: Spectrum Case
notes: Tier Weights Use Default Odds And unit.scale=1000000000000.
Within Each Tier, Item Base Weights Are Distributed Evenly With Any Remainder Assigned To The First Items In Listed Order.
Gold Pool Is Fully Expanded Into Doppler Phases And Gem Variants (Ruby, Sapphire, Black Pearl) As Separate Outcomes.
